Name: Listen to Animals' Words: Translation of Bird's Language - Sequel
Description: You meet Xuanyin again. This time, she is observing the doves on the rooftop...
QuestDesc: You meet Xuanyin again. This time, she is observing the doves on the rooftop...

Conditions.PreQuestName: Listen to Animals' Words: Translation of Bird's Language

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, I've got good news for you! The Gray Crested Gull language samples we collected last time were a big help!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Bird Language Translation Module is almost complete. I'm planning to test it with other birds to see if there are any areas for improvement. By the way, I have something serious to tell you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hold on! We have volunteers here!

Options.PlotLineKey: Do we need to attract them with food?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, let me thinkâ€¦ There are plenty of grains on the ground, but they don't seem interested. Seems like we need to find another way to attract their attention.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's hear what they're talking first.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Xuanyin loads the Pigeon Language Translation Module onto your Pangu Terminal.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The pigeons fly away after saying that.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey! How dare you fly away after name-calling! Are you trying to pick a fight?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Those impolite pigeons! I won't let them get away with it! Quickly scan to see where they flew off to.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Looks like the pigeons stood us up.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Is having a condescending attitude towards humans a common trait shared by birds?

Options.PlotLineKey: Why should we humans care about the opinions of birds? What's the business?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Come on! I'm full of fight now! I've got to get an explanation from them!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Next time, I must catch them and find it out!
